error.device_not_registered: Device is not registered in Tuya cloud

device.description: Select Tuya BLE device to setup. Device must be registered in the cloud using the mobile application. It's better to unbind the device from Tuya Bluetooth gateway, if any.

login.description:
Tuya BLE requires obtaining encryption key from Tuya cloud. Almost all devices only need to access the cloud once during setup.

Refer to documentation of Tuya integration to retrive the cloud credentials https://www.home-assistant.io/integrations/tuya/

Enter your Tuya credentials.
